subject: English
title: Chapter 45 Changing Sentences
content:
--- Page 1 ---
1. Read and change the sentences.

aed ara sat sec.

Teacher : Change one word at a time and make a different but meaningful sentence.

Maya sells butter.

2. Find other short sentences in the book and try to change them.
| Gerard gat BL area sitet safer cara ferdt saet Hea Act, ct Ter. A

* Priya liked sweets. « The sky is falling.
* He reached the mango tree. *« Don’t touch my sheep.

« We have a postbox in our classroom.
